solution_line_template: If the total number of points was {total_points}, and Layla won with {layla_points} points, Nahima scored {total_points}-{layla_points}= <<{total_points}-{layla_points}={nahima_points}>>{nahima_points} points.
Layla scored {layla_points}-{nahima_points}=<<{layla_points}-{nahima_points}={layla_more_than_nahima}>>{layla_more_than_nahima} more points than Nahima.
